data.description: API providing create/update of Bugzilla bugs
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module provides a perl API for adding and updating Bugzilla
    bugs. It can be useful in writing custom frontends to a Bugzilla
    server, and the frontends do not have to sit on the same server as
    long as they can reach it via HTTP.
